features: 【Small Size, Large Capacity】:Size: 20*30*9CM/7.8*11.8*3.5"The SEAFEW crossbody bag is lightweight and very durable and sturdy! It's small enough that it doesn't feel like a backpack, but big enough to carry quite a bit. Small zippered pocket for phones, power bank, wallet or outdoor/travel sundries. perfect for daily used.

【Adjustable Reversible Shoulder Strap】: The flexible strap of the chest bag can be adjusted left/right, easy to switch, you can freely adjust the shoulder strap according to your own preferences, easy to wear on the left or right shoulder. This crossbody backpack is perfect for both men and women.

【USB Charger Port & Headphone Hole】:Crossbody bag with USB charging port and headphone hole (portable USB charging cable not included), you can use the USB charging port to charge your phone easily and conveniently when you are outdoors and traveling. The cell phone hole on the chest bag allows you to charge and easily enjoy music while walking.

【Waterproof material and ergonomic design】Crossbody bag is made of high quality PU leather, durable, scratch-resistant, comfortable, waterproof and lightweight. Anti-theft zipper and security pocket can keep your items safe. High density and sturdy hand strap will ease your burden and travel easily. Lightweight crossbody backpack bags sits nicely and freely on your back/chest and if this hiking bags for men gets durty, only just need wipe it off to stay it clean.

【Multi-purpose Sling Backpack】:It’s a multipurpose bag that can be used as sling bag, sling backpack, crossbody shoulder bag, hiking daypack, travel chest bag, casual daypack, messenger bag, business bag. Perfect for travel, gym sport, hiking, camping, biking, family trip, office, and other occasions. Enjoy an easier and happier life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product is good quality and also have good price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic for Travel & Everyday!
reviews.reviewText: I think of this bag as an essentials bag. As a guy, sometimes I have a bit more stuff to carry after stuffing my pockets, so for me, this is an excellent option.The bag has 6 zippered pockets (wow!), and many more internal pockets which allows me to organize my stuff.In the very front is a pouch with a zipper whose tab can be concealed, and in the very back is a small pocket sized enough to carry a passport! This is super safe for travel. There is even a zippered pouch in the adjustable shoulder strap, amazing!In the middle there is a larger section with holders for pens, and small things. Towards the rear is the largest section with an internal zipper pocket, room for a mini-tablet, a mobile phone and a phone power bank. A cable inside connects to your battery and provides a USB port on the outside of the bag. There is also an opening to connect a wired headphone to a phone or media player inside. There is enough room inside for a small water bottle, pack-able wind breaker, keys, etc.This black bag is pretty sleek looking, for both guys and gals. The exterior is waterproof. The jet black zips are almost chrome-like in appearance and the adjustable completes the overall package!In conclusion, this is a cool bag and I'll be using it a lot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked great for three different theme parks
reviews.reviewText: The VGOCO Black Sling Bag is a versatile and stylish choice for those in need of a compact yet functional bag. I appreciate its sleek design, making it suitable for various occasions, from casual day trips to more adventurous hikes. The waterproof feature adds a layer of convenience, ensuring my belongings stay dry even in unpredictable weather. The anti-theft design and one-strap backpack style offer peace of mind, especially when traveling in crowded areas.I used this to carry all of our essentials at Cedar Point and Kings Island and it was comfortable to wear throughout the entire day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this backpack. It's the perfect size. I can fit my 10" iPad and carry my pins and essentials in this bag and it doesn't feel heavy and realtains it's slim design. The material definitely will protect against water and looks very stylish. There is a finish to its surface that makes this bag look premium. It will certainly compliment any street wear. A man bag with a fashion statement. I highly recommend it to the conscious fellow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots Of Handy Features, But Lack Of Double Zipper Pulls On Pockets Decreases Versatility
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. A “manly” (5th degree Judo black belt) friend of mine recently started using a sling bag (we humorously call it a “man-purse”) and it caught my attention in a good way. So when I spotted the VGOCO Black Sling / Crossbody Bag it seemed timely to try it out.After periodically wearing it for ~2 weeks here are my impressions:* The #1 feature I love is the multitude of pockets, both zipper protected (7) and open (9) = a total of 16, both large, medium & small.* Having said that, in my video I point out the #1 feature I dislike: Only one (1) of those zippered pockets has double zipper pulls (see Pic #1). Since a key feature of this bag is to be able to switch the chest strap so the bag hangs left or right, it would be nice if (at least) all 4 of the front zippered pockets could be easily accessed while the bag is across one’s chest. As it is, when wearing the bag over the right shoulder, access to 3 of those zippers is clumsy at best.* Pic #2 shows my iPhone 13 Pro Max tucked into the front pocket. What appears to be the top of that pocket (encircled in yellow) - IS NOT pocket. The top of the pocket is pretty much even with the zipper. Arguably one’s phone should be the MOST accessible item in this pack; if VGOCO increased the height of that front pocket by maybe 3/4” the phone would fit so the zipper could be closed. As it is, the few times I’ve put my $1,000 phone in that front pocket it has slipped out. Not good!* Having done a fairly thorough analysis of the sling bag’s quality, e.g., hardware sturdiness, seam structure, water resistant padded material, I must say I’m impressed.* I’m including Pic #3 to point out the “Hand strap” which is a quick grab-n-go feature I’ve enjoyed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for amusement parks!
reviews.reviewText: My husband and daughter go to amusement parks a few times a month, and the Fanny pack just wasn’t up to the task, so I found this for them. It’s such a good bag, that I kinda want to order another for me! It’s a perfect size. Fit their phones, sunscreen, personal fans, a water bottle, medicine and cooling towels. It has a few zipper pockets, and another on the inside of the strap. My favorite thing is the uSB charger that is on the bag. Genius!!!

reviews.reviewText: Definitely recommend. Lots of pockets. Great material. Comfortable to wear. You can even connect a portable charger to charge your devices. Would buy again
